duties_responsibilities.duty: Develop best in class, first person and other game-play animations for the XDefiant game.
Craft hand-keyed animations and edit existing motion-capture data for authentic weapons and user-facing related actions.
Work closely with Design and other departments to facilitate game-play tuning, balance, and user-facing expectations.
Interact with Technical Artists and Technical Animators to define Character Animation Pipeline needs and improvements.
Adhere to quality review processes and express feedback to others in open forums.
Play the game to understand gameplay requirements and contribute to game improvement.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor's degree in Animation, Game Design, or a related field (Master's preferred)
